sentences.en: A decreased RBC mass (anemia) may be caused by blood loss, hemolysis, or decreased production.
sentences.cn: 红细胞数量降低（贫血）可能是由于失血，溶血，或产生数量减少。

sentences.en: Aim Effect of hemolysiS on liver function analysis.
sentences.cn: 目的:探讨溶血对肝功能分析的影响.

sentences.en: Four remnant shunt with hemolysis were found 24 hours later after operation.
sentences.cn: 术后24h有4例出现残余分流伴溶血.

sentences.en: Hemolysis can be confirmed by observation of schistocytes on a blood smear.
sentences.cn: 溶血可以通过观察血涂片中的裂细胞而确诊.

sentences.en: Is the Suppression of Hemolysis by CDP - choline during Human Blood Storage Associated with Energy Metabolism?
sentences.cn: 胞二磷胆碱对贮存红细胞溶血的抑制作用是否与能量代谢有关?

sentences.en: It was proposed that knowing the possible mechanism of sports hemolysis can positively prevent its happening.
sentences.cn: 了解运动性溶血发生的各种可能机制,对有效预防其发生起到积极的作用.

sentences.en: Methods Manner plate assay, contact hemolysis and supernatant assay were used.
sentences.cn: 方法平板检测法, 接触溶血法,上清检测法.

sentences.en: Methods: The hemolysis was induced respectively by H _ 2 O _ 2 in vitro and acetylphenyl hydrazine ( APH ) in vivo.
sentences.cn: 结果外秃疮花提取物对H2O2诱导的鼠红细胞溶血的抑制率可达78%.

sentences.en: Methods: To use blood heart of rabbit to make in vitro hemolysis test.
sentences.cn: 方法: 利用兔心血做体外溶血试验.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the relationship between CD 59 and traditional hemolysis tests for paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria.
sentences.cn: 目的研究CD59抗原与传统的阵发性睡眠性血红蛋白尿症溶血试验之间的关系.

sentences.en: Other salient features of the case include fever, hematuria, hemolysis, and coagulopathy.
sentences.cn: 这个病例其他显著的特点包括发热, 血尿, 溶血作用和凝血病.

sentences.en: Otherwise , hemolysis will happen, which may cause the patient to die.
sentences.cn: 否则就会会发生溶血, 溶血是致命的.

sentences.en: RSP - R can also inhibiting the hemolysis of mice red blood cell as well.
sentences.cn: 另外,RSP -R 还可抑制大鼠红细胞氧化溶血程度.

sentences.en: The complications included high degree atrioventricular block ( AVB, 6 cases ), hemolysis ( 2 cases ) and occluder displaced ( 1 case ).
sentences.cn: 发生高度房室传导阻滞 ( AVB)6例(1.3% ), 溶血2例(0.4% ) ,封堵器明显移位1例(0.2% ).

sentences.en: There are dilatation of blood sinus, hemolysis, macrophage reactions erc.
sentences.cn: 脾血窦扩张、溶血及巨噬细胞反应等现象;

sentences.en: Xan inhibited that RBC hemolysis and the generation of MDA was decreased.
sentences.cn: 3种Xan均能抑制RBC自 氧化,显著减少RBC自氧化过程中MDA的含量.

words.tran_cn: [生化] 溶血素，溶红血球素（等于haemolysin）
[生理][免疫]溶血（现象）；血细胞溶解
